EmailTemplate.subject: Residential Trip to Taiwan
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
The BSKL Chinese department is planning on taking a residential trip to Taiwan from the 15th June to the 14th July 2012.
Students will attend daily Mandarin courses at the National Taiwan Normal University. After the course, students will have the opportunities to visit some wonderful places in Taiwan.
The trip is open to 20 students only from Middle school.
If you would like to get further information regarding the trip, please attend a talk being held by the Chinese department on Friday 7th December 2012 at 2pm in the ICT room.
Kind Regards, The Chinese Department
